title: Star Money
description: Seldom has the nature of modern woman -- lovely, ruthless, and mislet -- been analyzed with more brilliant perception and complete truth. Kathleen Winsor presents a merciles picture of Shireen Delaney -- what she wanted, how she got it, and what it did to her. Here is a novel memorable for its emotional intensity, its outspoken honesty, its incisive characterizations, and above all its magic story-telling skill.
author: Kathleen Winsor
